The cult members treated their leader with _________ loyalty that verged on the obsessive and made them willing, should the need ever arise, to do so much as lay down their lives for him.
A.	a fanatical
B.	an arbitrary
C.	a fickle
D.	a mortifying
E.	a zealous
F.	an indeterminate
